text: phir us drdh vachan ko yaad karo, jo hamane tumhaare oopar toor (parvat) ko uthaakar liya. (hamane kahaah) pakad lo, jo hamane diya hai tumhen drdhata se aur suno. to unhonne kahaah hamane suna aur avagya kee. aur unake dilon mein bachhade ka prem pila diya gaya, unakee avagya ke kaaran. (he nabee!) aap kah deejiyeh bura hai vah jisaka aadesh de raha hai tumhen tumhaara eemaan, yadi tum eemaan vaale ho
